body.p: Combinations of characters with characters written above for which there is no Unicode equivalent are tagged with <hi @rendition="#stacked">. The characters concerned are separated from each other according to the Unicode recommendation for writing binomial coefficients by means of an broken pipe (¦ U+00A6 BROKEN BAR). The base character always comes first.

p.i: Source: Quenstedt, Friedrich August: Handbuch der Mineralogie. Tübingen, 1855. [Facsimile 510]

body.p: If several characters written above are stacked, <hi rendition="#stacked"> is nested.
